Event.name: Dressing
Event.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Wearer</fen> puts on an item of <fen>Clothing</fen>, which then occupies the <fen>Body_location</fen>.
<ex><fex name="wea">You</fex> didn't have to <t>dress</t> <fex name="man">like a pirate</fex> <fex name="pur">to impress me</fex>. <fex name="bod">INI</fex></ex> <ex>He <t>put</t> <t>on</t> <fex name="Clothing">his thickest pair of gloves</fex> and then went back out to see if he could move them now. <fex name="bod">INI</fex></ex> <ex>Jack <t>put</t> <t>on</t> <fex name="Clothing">his watch</fex> - <fex name="bod">on his right wrist</fex>, and checked the time.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Wearer
Arg.definition: <def-root>The individual that puts <fen>Clothing</fen> on their body. </def-root>

Arg.name: Clothing
Arg.definition: <def-root><fen>Clothing</fen> is used for the item of clothing that the <fen>Wearer</fen> ends up wearing.</def-root>

Arg.name: Body_location
Arg.definition: <def-root>The body part that the <fen>Clothing</fen> ends up covering.</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>Any expression which describes a property of the donning event which is not directly related to the trajectory of the <fen>Clothing</fen>'s motion expresses the frame element <fen>Manner</fen>. Descriptions of speed, steadiness, grace, means of motion, and other things count as <fen>Manner</fen> expressions. </def-root>

Arg.name: Depictive
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies any <fen>Depictive</fen> phrase describing the <fen>Wearer</fen> or <fen>Clothing</fen> during the act.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Means</fen> is an act whereby the <fen>Wearer</fen> puts on the <fen>Clothing</fen> </def-root>

Arg.name: Result
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Result</fen> of the Placing.</def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Duration</fen> of the Wearing that results from putting on the <fen>Clothing</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Explanation</fen> indicates why the <fen>Wearer</fen> puts on the <fen>Clothing</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The time when the <fen>Wearer</fen> puts an item of <fen>Clothing</fen> on.
<ex>She had <t>put</t> the dress <t>on</t> <fex name="tim">this morning</fex> expecting it to be sunny.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>An action that the <fen>Wearer</fen> intends to accomplish by putting on <fen>Clothing</fen>. </def-root>

lexUnit.name: don.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: put on (an item of clothing).

lexUnit.name: put on.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: manipulate (a clothing or accoutrement) such that one ends up wearing it.

lexUnit.name: slip on.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: put on (clothing) gracefully or sensuously.

lexUnit.name: pull on.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: put on (an item of clothing)

lexUnit.name: dress up.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: dress in smart or formal clothes, or in a special costume.
